SELECT
p.projectId AS projectId, p.title AS title, p.thumbnail AS thumbnail, p.endDate AS endDate, p.projectStatus AS projectStatus,
r.rewardName AS rewardName,
b.backingId AS backingId, b.backingStatus AS backingStatus,
bd.quantity AS quantity, bd.price AS price
FROM backing b
JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId
WHERE b.userId =#{userId} ORDER BY b.createdAt DESC
